name: insurance-crm
description: Insurance CRM - Modern WordPress plugin for insurance agencies

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: npm run minify:css && npm run build:css-critical
scripts.build:js: npm run minify:js && npm run build:js-modules
scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o assets/css/admin.min.css assets/css/admin.css && cleancss -o assets/css/representative-panel-global.min.css assets/css/representative-panel-global.css && cleancss -o public/css/representative-panel.min.css public/css/representative-panel.css
scripts.minify:js: terser assets/js/representative-panel.js -o assets/js/representative-panel.min.js -c -m && terser assets/js/dashboard-widgets.js -o assets/js/dashboard-widgets.min.js -c -m && terser public/js/representative-panel.js -o public/js/representative-panel.min.js -c -m
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.lint: npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js
scripts.optimize: npm run build && npm run optimize:images

author: Mehmet BALKAY | Anadolu Birlik
